# 1997 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1997 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1998 for the 1997 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1997 are as follows.
